embed.title: Guide to F2P (free-to-play) game items
embed.description: Gems are precious currency. Use them wisely.

fields.name: Recommended
fields.value:
• Acquiring hero shards through hero events (about 320k <:aowgem:847363788592119838> to get one hero to level 15).
• Temple of Fusion (use sparingly).
• Upgrading troops to level-9 and level-10.
• Extra arena battles

fields.name: Not Recommended
fields.value:
• Opening hero/troops chests.
• Buying items in the Shop page.
• Buying items in the Mystic Store.
• Buying additional troops during Lucky Draws.
• Honor Hunting demo
